page.title: 17SHOPS
page.content: fabric is cotton, as in all the clothes shops. The shop attracts people because its prices are reasonable. There aren't many childrens' clothes shops. Badgers sells mens' clothes. Didcot has lots of hairdressers. Of the two main ones, Didcot Hair Stylists and Broadway Cut-in, the former may have 30 customers daily. On averaga about 15-20 people go to Broadway Cut-in each day. Next door is a Barber's shop. Didcot has three chemists, Boots, Savory & Moore and G.K. Chemists. The most popular one is Boots. They all sell some medicines without prescription and some only when the pharmacist is around. In winter the most popular medicine is cough mixture and in the summer it is hay fever tablets and all of the year round they sell pain killers mostly.
